website_summaries.verdict: A high quality omega-3 fish oil supplement formulated specifically for new moms.
pros: Lemon flavored and easy to swallow capsules
Contains DHA for baby’s brain development and EPA for postpartum wellbeing
cons: Limited focus on omega-3s, so wise to supplement with another postnatal vitamin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After my first pregnancy my vitamin d levels plummeted and I experienced extreme fatigue and a bit of PPD. I was vitamin D deficient through my second pregnancy as well and was determined not to repeat my PPD. I started taking this asap after birth combined with a 5000 I.U. Vitamin D Supplement and at 6 week check-up my levels were back in normal range which is hard to do so quickly. Note you have to take two pills a day. They are medium sized, so if you have trouble with pills keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Britt C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I like that I didn’t have to think twice about whether I was getting the right dosage as this is specially formulated. I gave it 4 stars because I feel it is over priced. You can get similar formulas at equivalent quality for half the price. The pills were easy to swallow and no after taste (a mark of quality!) If money is of no consequence then this is for you! On behalf of the claims to balance mood - tis very true! I recommend this to postpartum mom struggling with depression as step one. Omega 3 has helps me level off emotionally.
customer_reviews.author: Carole B

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Trust this
customer_reviews.text: I am appalled...just opened my pack of vitamins and despite the fact that I broke the outside plastic seal, when I opened the actual bottle the Inner safety seal was broke. And 3/4 of the vitamins were missing. I feel violated and wonder if they do this with all their bottles?
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: 8th bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I started to take Nordic Nature products since I found out I was pregnant with my first one back in 2017. I took their prenatal and postnatal products throughout my two pregnancy from 2017 to 2019. I also use their baby and kids fish oil for my kids. I breastfed my first one for a long time and still breast feeding my second one. I think it's essential to take them on time so my kids get EHA and DHA through my milk (I know breastmilk already has them, but they play such a key role in brain development, I just loving taking extra). They are easy to swallow, has a very light fruity smell. very great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Best supplement I've ever taken
customer_reviews.text: Best supplement I've ever taken. Almost immediately it helped improve my mood and I would vouch over and over again for the effectiveness of DHA and EPA in postpartum wellbeing. I love the Nordic Naturals brand and though the price is a bit high, I feel it is well worth it for the quality and effectiveness of the product. Every new mom should try this!
customer_reviews.author: American Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: I've taken the Prenatal Omega-3 during my entire pregnancy, no problems so I decided to get these Postnatal ones and they aren't the same. These made me feel sick and they are so much harder to swallow. I can't take these unless on a very full stomach.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as well
customer_reviews.text: I am 11 months postpartum and have taken a DHA/fish oil supplement and prenatal vitamin since becoming pregnant. I wanted to try a less expensive fish oil and drop my prenatal vitamin. I did not feel like this supplement helped manage my anxiety nearly as good as the Rainbow Light brand. I will be going back to their supplement.
customer_reviews.author: JKV

customer_reviews.title: i've been extremely satisfied with both
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for 6+ months and never had a single fish burp or ill effect. I take after I eat dinner and don't even think twice about it. I took the prenatal DHA while pregnant but switched to this for breastfeeding once I saw the different levels of DHA/EPA/etc. i've been extremely satisfied with both.
customer_reviews.author: KateKay

customer_reviews.title: No fish taste!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best fish oil supplements I have ever taken. Been taking them for over a year and they don't make me feel groggy like other ones and have no aftertaste. However at 2xs a day, they're expensive. The 1000iu vit D is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: MzBury

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for moms who are breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I have been these taking postnatal omega-3 pills for the past 9 months as I continue breast-feeding. I trust the Nordic Naturals brand above all others.
customer_reviews.author: SES

customer_reviews.title: Seem okay
customer_reviews.text: As with any vitamin, I'm not sure if they're doing what I hope they are! They are easier to swallow compared to other brands since the capsule is smaller, so the lemon flavor isn't really necessary for me. I don't get any indigestion after taking these.
customer_reviews.author: CrowTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: New Mom Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s a placebo effect or real, but after having my second baby, I couldn’t imagine a day without it. This calms me down, and makes me feel happier and in an overall better mood. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: It’s odd that everytime I order these it’s never half way full for that bottle. But they do leave me in a better mood and I haven’t been sick since I’ve been taking these
customer_reviews.author: ZombieNinja

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins really helped me recover from postpartum issues such as depression. Highly recommend trying them.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Hurts to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Would rather take huge horse pills than this shape of pill. Hurts to swallow. I take tons of vitamins/supliments and this is the only pill that I have a hard time swallowing.
customer_reviews.author: Grathan Huff

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been feeling great! I’m not sure if it’s becahse of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeling great! I’m not sure if it’s becahse of the vitamins or because it’s my second baby and did t experience feeling that great right after birth, I already Re purchased the vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Vivian rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Best DHA
customer_reviews.text: I love this DHA omega fish oil supplement, for all 3 of my kiddos when I am pregnant with them I took this and there is no fishy smell and it works well! I recommended all my pregnant mama!
customer_reviews.author: Clara Hossain

customer_reviews.title: Great supplements
customer_reviews.text: I love these supplements. Nordic naturals are the best. No fishy aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Easy on stomach
customer_reviews.text: The baby mama loves these, she has a sensitive stomach and these are fine . We've gone through 3 or 4 bottles now .
customer_reviews.author: Derick

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like they are easy to swallow and don’t leave a fish after taste at all. Premium product
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent post natal fish oil supplement
customer_reviews.text: I love that these have no taste or aftertaste. They are easy to swallow and helpful for regulating mood and weight after giving birth. Great brand of vitamins that are well made and trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harder pills to swallow
customer_reviews.text: The pills aren’t soft like their prenatal ones and are harder to swallow. They seem bigger too.
customer_reviews.author: vinni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Love these vitamins, can tell when I don’t take them. No fish burps!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M. Hemond

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Naturals is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and no fish burps! I love this brand for its purity and reputation. I love that they add flavor to mask the smell. I definitely feel that it has helped with my mood and overall health after having my son.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Schaffren Beeth

customer_reviews.title: No smell. Great!
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a smell like other brands. I used to take Garden of Eden brand, and that one made me nausea. This one is much better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. I researched forever to find something similar it’s worth the money. Nothing better.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Confident first-time momma
customer_reviews.text: I have used Nordic Naturals for years. I used both their prenatal and postnatal omega-3 with confidence that I was giving both myself and baby the best nutrients. I have always felt assured with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great. Lemony.
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement. Wish it came unflavored (like the prenatal ones) or had other flavors to choose from just coz I’m not a fan of lemon.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: ... taking this post-natal vitamins since July and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this post-natal vitamins since July and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, no bad aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: This is the only DHA that I have ever had without an icky aftertaste. This is the best brand and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia customera

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Little bit fishy smell/taste compared to the prenatal one
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I trust this brand has the highest quality fish oil in the market.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: good for pregnant women
customer_reviews.text: Bought many times for sisters and her friends, they seems like it
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fishy lemon burps are A-OK
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up at Pharmaca originally when I was pregnant in the prenatal version. The shopkeeper in the store said these were good or baby and wouldn't be too fishy. They were fishy when I burped. I don't think she had ever been pregnant therefore did not have a pregnant woman's sense of anything Well 5 months post baby and I still take Nordic Naturals. My baby is healthy, happy, and all things a 5 month old should be. The lemon in the fish oil pills help a little with the fishy-ness but nothing can cover the burp taste completely.
customer_reviews.author: Ami KM

customer_reviews.title: Good postnatal vitamins BUT super slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: These are a great source of omegas! No aftertaste and I was able to take them on an empty stomach. However, when I ordered them with my prime membership, they took 12 days to get here so I won't be ordering them from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: All stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: My bottle arrived and all the capsules were stuck together. I’m disappointed, makes me feel like they were not kept at the proper temperature and the oil could be rancid.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it in April 2018, and got a bottle that expires in Aug. 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: The only fish oil supplement I'll take, especially while nursing! No fish burps, easy to swallow, highest purity/quality, and a hefty dose of vitamin D. That said, I also have to take a separate vitamin D supplement in order to reach the dose recommended by my lactation consultant (6000 IU for an exclusively breastfed baby in order to avoid having to give her drops of her own).
customer_reviews.author: Katie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product sent
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product bc I love it, but was sent the wrong thing. I ordered lemon flavored POSTnatal and received PREnatal.
customer_reviews.author: jparlett14

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but doesn't taste bad
customer_reviews.text: It smells like fish oil but doesn't taste like anything.
customer_reviews.author: dirtymonk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved Nordic Naturals! I took the strawberry flavored prenatal during my pregnancy and now that baby is here I take these! They taste great, and I feel they help me feel better after the birth of my child.
customer_reviews.author: Chavah Devorah Rut

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the prenatal DHA from Nordic naturals, but these made me really sick to my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: No fishy aftertaste. Great product that I trust for the health of my baby and myself. So thankful for it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great product for nursing mamas
customer_reviews.text: Great product for nursing mamas! Omega-3s are essential for babes brain development. This is the only brand I trust to be truly free of synthetic materials.
customer_reviews.author: Regan Hage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have been a great addition to my daily vitamins. No fishy aftertaste or smell. Easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H

customer_reviews.title: No fishy smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nordic naturals products! This brand was recommended by my naturopath a few years ago & they are wonderful. Best part, no fishy after taste/burps!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth ashley edwards

customer_reviews.title: I researched a lot of different Omega 3 and different fish oils and am so happy with the quality of this brand
customer_reviews.text: I used the Prenatal Omega 3 when I was pregnant so it made sense to order the Postnatal Omega 3 after the baby was born. I researched a lot of different Omega 3 and different fish oils and am so happy with the quality of this brand. I feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Roni J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small gel caps. No nasty fish oil after taste
customer_reviews.author: MeKeAloha

customer_reviews.title: Love this! No after taste
customer_reviews.text: Love this! No after taste! I have been using it for the past 9 weeks postpartum. Great for all moms and beneficial for baby too if breastfeeding. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: ml

customer_reviews.title: The pills were stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: It was all glued together so that it was impossible to take a pill out. I had to stab it with a fork several times to make the pills separate from each others which led into many punctured pills and lots of gross oily fish smell.
customer_reviews.author: nooshinlw

product_meta.title: Nordic Naturals Postnatal Omega-3, Lemon - 1120 Total Omega-3 + 1000 IU Vitamin D3 - 60 Soft Gels - Formulated for New Moms; Supports Optimal Wellness, Positive Mood, Healthy Metabolism - 30 Servings
feature_bullets: Award-Winning Postnatal Vitamins; Postnatal Omega-3 won the Women’s Essentials Award from “Taste for Life,” the Best of Supplements Award from “Better Nutrition,” & is the Official Postnatal Omega-3 of the American Pregnancy Association

Why Omega-3s; Postnatal Omega-3 provides 456 mg of brain-nourishing DHA to support your nursing baby's neurological development, & 586 mg of EPA that research shows can support a positive mood & healthy metabolism for you

Better Absorption, Better Taste, No Fishy Burps; All of our omega-3 fish oil concentrates are in the triglyceride molecular form (the form naturally found in fish) for optimal absorption; Great lemon taste

Purity Guaranteed; Every batch of Nordic Naturals fish oil is crafted from fresh, wild-caught, omega-rich fish; Nordic Naturals is committed to using only non-GMO ingredients; Gluten- & dairy-free; No artificial colors or preservatives

Ethical Innovation; Nordic Naturals has always been at the forefront of sustainable and ethical practices in the natural products industry; Through science and innovation, we are committed to delivering safe, effective nutrients for optimal wellness
